name: Verify user is able to download all pdf report including sub store

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to download all pdf report including sub store ({Store=UAE L2, Start Date=01-01-2022, Level=Level2, Product Category=Vaccine Routine, Storage Temperature=+5C Capacity, Start Month=08-2022})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application

Then User login as "Store Operator"

And User select "Store Operator" from "Role" in "Welcome" tab

Wait for time: 2
And User click on "Apply" button
Click on button: Apply
And User click on "Reports" tab
Click on tab: Reports
And User wait for "20" seconds
Wait for time: 20

And User wait for "3" seconds
And User click on Export Report button

And User wait for "2" seconds
Then User validate UI and "PDF" data for "Stock Management Summary" with Sub Store
